name: INDIANA AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant v. INDIANA AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Indiana Area School District v. Indiana Area Education Ass'n

judges: BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD and MeCAFFERY, JJ.
parties: INDIANA AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant v. INDIANA AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been IMPROVIDENT’ LY GRANTED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Leslie Dawn Kitsko, William C. Andrews, Andrews & Price, Pittsburgh, for Indiana Area School Dist., appellant.
Robert J. Abraham, Pittsburgh, William K. Eckel, Johns-town, for Indiana Area Educ. Ass’n, appellee.
Lynne Lepore Wilson, PA State Educ. Ass’n (PSEA), Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania State Educ., appellee amicus curiae.
casebody.head_matter:
957 A.2d 273
INDIANA AREA SCHOOL DISTRICT, Appellant v. INDIANA AREA EDUCATION ASSOCIATION, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 5, 2008.
Decided Oct. 21, 2008.
Leslie Dawn Kitsko, William C. Andrews, Andrews & Price, Pittsburgh, for Indiana Area School Dist., appellant.
Robert J. Abraham, Pittsburgh, William K. Eckel, Johns-town, for Indiana Area Educ. Ass’n, appellee.
Lynne Lepore Wilson, PA State Educ. Ass’n (PSEA), Harrisburg, for Pennsylvania State Educ., appellee amicus curiae.
BEFORE: CASTILLE, C.J., SAYLOR, EAKIN, BAER, TODD and MeCAFFERY, JJ.
